meanings.definition: Of very poor quality or inferior.
meanings.sent1: The crummiest toy in the store broke as soon as I touched it.
meanings.sent2: This is the crummiest sandwich I have ever tasted.
meanings.sent3: Even the crummiest magician could perform better tricks than that.
meanings.sent4: The crummiest excuse for a painting hung crookedly on the wall.
meanings.sent5: The crummiest car in the lot had flat tires and a broken windshield.

meanings.definition: In a very poor or inferior manner.
meanings.sent1: She sang the crummiest out of all the contestants at the talent show.
meanings.sent2: He played the crummiest during the entire game.
meanings.sent3: The comedian told jokes crummily, making the audience groan.
meanings.sent4: The team performed crummily in the championship match.
meanings.sent5: The student wrote crummily on the exam due to lack of preparation.
